heading: HB05402
0: AN ACT MANDATING GOVERNMENT OFFICES AND/OR ESTABLISHMENTS TO ALLOT AT LEAST THIRTY PERCENT (30%) OF THEIR ENERGY REQUIREMENTS TO SOLAR ENERGY, AND COROLLARY, MANDATING THE SAME TO INSTALL SOLAR PANELS UNTO THEIR BUILDINGS

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05402
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING GOVERNMENT OFFICES AND/OR ESTABLISHMENTS TO ALLOT AT LEAST THIRTY PERCENT (30%) OF THEIR ENERGY REQUIREMENTS TO SOLAR ENERGY, AND COROLLARY, MANDATING THE SAME TO INSTALL SOLAR PANELS UNTO THEIR BUILDINGS

DATE FILED : 2017-04-03
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL

ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE

      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2018-01-29
      3. Referred to the Technical Working Group (TWG) on 2018-03-05
